Oh Tony don’t you see? Don’t you see what we’ve become? We’re losers, honey, we’re not winners, we’re losers...

Elvira is trying to make Tony see that their lifestyle is empty, devoid of any real meaning. They have no one to share their opulent wealth with.(see the “nick the pig” reference in the lines above.) Just because they live like “winners” doesn’t mean they actually are.

The most influential movie in the history of Rap!

In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel while succumbing to greed.
